<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Adept](/NPCs.aspx?ID=925)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Adepts have unlocked only the most minor occult mysteries of the universe. A few are chosen by accomplished practitioners for further training. Others volunteer to join a cabal by passing an initiation ritual.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Mystic_Adept.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Adept](/NPCs.aspx?ID=925)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 228</row>

**Perception** +4

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +5, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +3, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +7, [Scribing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Focused Thinker** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The adept focuses inward to muster knowledge and wisdom. While in this state of concentration, they gain a +2 status bonus to checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), but take a -2 penalty to Perception. They can end their focused state with a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

**Items**
journal, robes, scroll case, [Writing Set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
journal +6 ([Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Occult Spells Known** DC 14
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177)

</column>
